=Math=
The basic extensions for Math.

|| *Call* || *Meaning* ||
|| mod(i, n) || return x, where i == k * n + x (x > 0) ||

=Math.Stats=
The basic of statistics. 

|| *Call* || *Meaning* ||
|| sum(arr) || gets the sum of an array ||
|| mean(arr) || gets the average of an array ||
|| var(arr) || gets sample variance of an array ||
|| stddev(arr) || gets the standard deviation of an array ||
|| linearLeastSquare( X, Y, fn=(x=>x) ) || gets the a, where fn(Y) = a fn(X) + b ||

=Math.Point=
The point for the vector.

|| *Call* || *Meaning* ||
|| new Math.Point(arr) || builds new point by coordinates array ||

=Math.Vector=
The vector in n dimension.

|| *Call* || *Meaning* ||
|| new Math.Vector(arr) || builds new vector by coordinates array ||
|| new Math.Vector(arr1, arr2) || builds new vector by coordinates array of two point ||
|| new Math.Vector(point1, point2) || builds new vector by two Math.Point ||
|| norm(vec) || gets the length of the vec ||
|| dot(v1, v2) || calculates the dot result of two vectors ||
|| cos(v1, v2) || calculates the cos result of two vectors ||
